channel.title: Demote sanga from CM
channel.description:
Alright -- nothing against you, [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=52898]sanga282[/url].. But I really don't think you deserve CM. To me, you don't fit the criteria because I don't know who the hell you are.
ps the only 'no' so far is because `jason is severely dyslexic.

item.title: Demote sanga from CM
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

2 people is way to many IMO.

They piss me off majorly, especially when I get idiotic PMs.

If we changed the domain to asdcsfsd.com kept moparisthebest.com pointing to that, then after say, a month linked moparisthebest.com to moparisthebest.com

They’d be disconnected, they wouldn’t know how to find the other side of the community nor would they need to. All you’d need to do is add a “General” section to that board.

As far as stretching out the forum, as FastBawlz said, emphasis on more things. We have a runescape board, yet alot of our members play WoW, why not a WoW board (never played it tbh, but I still think it would be an active section).

Expand the programming sections, have tutorial and project boards. A first person shooter board, game reviews and such. Computer builds, tech boards, Hardware discussion - the list is endless.

Read full topic

There are a few problems that need sorting, but a few topics posted on this site that don’t belong here is at the bottom of the list.

item.title: Demote sanga from CM
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Rep/CM:
If the majority of people want the change, I would be willing to allow negative rep (as I see this as a better solution to voting in CMs), I would probably cap the rep on the bottom end at 0 to prevent people from being completely screwed, and we could see how it goes. I think it will probably turn out how it was on kaitnieks.com, except worse because there are many more members, most of which are less mature than back then.

Site:
This has always been an RS cheating site, whether you are here for that now or not that is the reason you came here in the first place, am I right? Many times in the past RS cheating has been ‘dead’ until something new comes along. And something will come along. I have been rather inactive lately, there have just been a lot of changes happening on the home front, but most of those are over with and I will be as active as I once was soon enough. I will put up a new homepage from some of the top picks of the contest, fix the banning and warning systems, and I also need to write a spoof-proof serverstatus page and a better moparscape client. Top priority is the ban/warn system, the others will come about in due time.

moparscape:
Not so long ago I was doing a major upgrade to the forum, and put up a poll to see if many thought I should go ahead and permanently separate moparscape and moparisthebest. It was a landslide against the separation, and when you think about it, the only thing the two sites share is a userbase, which simply makes administration easier. What would be the benefit in fully separating them?

As always I am open to any suggestions, feel free.

Read full topic

item.title: Demote sanga from CM
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote="``jason, post:64, topic:213133"][quote author=casey. link=topic=280598.msg2290774#msg2290774 date=1214135193]
bump greeny up to global also
[/quote]
Agreed, but i don’t think it will happen he hasn’t even got mute/mod/warn powers (i don’t think) :([/quote]

I’m also on a final warning for being a dick to idiots.
Thing is, if I were global, there would be alot less idiots

Thanks for the comments though casey, I have quite a few ideas for launching this site into a “new era” but I’m not telling anyone anything until the issues outlined in my previous post are sorted out.

I’ve concluded many times the community needs to somehow “restart” the problem is with creating new communities: ECAB, Varek, is they fail because they don’t have the starting userbase. This site has that much needed user base and could easily be rejuvenated.

Read full topic

item.title: Demote sanga from CM
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“k00dr, post:61, topic:213133”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=280598.msg2283094#msg2283094 date=1213779671]
Hmm…

As soon as 1 gets 50 rep I say make a script that automatically posts in this section whether we accept them in Community Member or not, if they have over 50% saying yes by 3 days then they get in.
[me=Uriko]agrees with frank_ on -ve[/me]
[/quote]

What if they don’t get in? Rep-reset?

And by the way, what does a community member do with “rep”?
A community member doesn’t need “rep” to gain ACTUAL reputation, it should be achieved by other means.
In my opinion, it should be removed as soon as you get in…[/quote]if they have real rep, they will get teh rep++

@Greeny wrote:

-Ve rep
-Require polls to get in by current CMs (this was brought in at one time I’m sure, or atleast there was a section for suggesting new candidates.)

-new front page etc

moparscape
faggot mods like greeny
